location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Howz Al Kishla'. Photographer: Domnick Photo, Basrah

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:199 x 294 mmCondition:The image is in good condition though punctured partially four times along the lower edge and twice completely by a hole punching device, also along the lower edge.Foliation:‘155’Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This photograph shows trench filled with water, possibly an irrigation channel in Shaikh Aḥmad's estates at Fao, in the date gardens affected by the Basra port authorities’ widening of the roads.The trench extends from foreground to background and is filled with water, and set below the road to the left.Inscriptions:Recto, upper left, in pen: ‘155’Verso, upper left, in pen: ‘HOWZ Al. Kishla Fao’Lower left, ink stamp: ‘DOMNICK PHOTO BASRAH’
